item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, December 17, 2024 at 3:35 AM UTC
item.description:
1. New LLM optimization technique slashes memory costs up to 75% (133 points | 38 comments)
2. Settlement from Meta for Australian Users Impacted by Cambridge Analytica (16 points | 4 comments)
3. Xiaomi Home Integration for Home Assistant (428 points | 236 comments)
4. Go Protobuf: The New Opaque API (189 points | 65 comments)
5. Lfgss shutting down 16th March 2025 (day before Online Safety Act is enforced) (418 points | 262 comments)
6. Veo 2: Our video generation model (346 points | 169 comments)
7. Making a watch from scratch (167 points | 30 comments)
8. In Search of a Faster SQLite (218 points | 91 comments)
9. Why is it so hard to buy things that work well? (2022) (513 points | 431 comments)
10. Advent of Code on the Nintendo DS (51 points | 14 comments)
11. What did Ada Lovelace's program actually do? (2018) (214 points | 74 comments)
12. Forgotten Collection of Charles de Gaulle's Manuscripts Discovered in a Safe (38 points | 1 comment)
13. Ruby Video – On a mission to index all Ruby conferences (165 points | 20 comments)
14. The Red Beads Experiment (12 points | discuss)
15. Ask HN: SWEs how do you future-proof your career in light of LLMs? (253 points | 529 comments)
16. Modelica (221 points | 70 comments)
17. Alley Cat Remeow Edition (19 points | 7 comments)
18. A new twist: The molecular machines that loop chromosomes also twist DNA (12 points | 1 comment)
19. Popeye and Tintin enter the public domain in 2025 along with Faulkner, Hemingway (238 points | 73 comments)
20. U2's Larry Mullen Jr: my dyscalculia makes 'counting like climbing Everest' (40 points | 25 comments)
21. Using Guile for Emacs (124 points | 40 comments)
22. Mirror bacteria research poses significant risks, scientists warn (141 points | 119 comments)
23. Our muscles will atrophy as we climb the Kardashev Scale (110 points | 156 comments)
24. Quick takes on the recent OpenAI public incident write-up (56 points | 15 comments)
25. Show HN: NCompass Technologies – yet another AI Inference API, but hear us out (23 points | 27 comments)
26. Principles of Educational Programming Language Design (30 points | 21 comments)
27. Converge (YC S23) is hiring founding engineer #2 ( | hide)
28. Backward-incompatible GRUB2 change causing BIOS setup bootloop (70 points | 14 comments)
29. Absinthe: From green fairy to moral panic (37 points | 24 comments)
30. Konwinski Prize (123 points | 39 comments)
